content.rendered:
This Christmas, we opened the World’s first Connected Restaurant for Three Ireland + Samsung Ireland, giving some lucky families the chance to have Christmas dinner in Dublin with the ones they miss in Sydney. 

Our unique pop up brought families split between Ireland and Australia together for Christmas, despite the 17,209km distance and 11-hour time difference between them. Demand for bookings at the restaurant was exceptionally high, with enough table requests to fill the 4-day pop up for 3-months straight. Watch the best moments from The Connected Restaurant: 

See more: TheConnectedRestaurant.com 

 

Update: We’re super stoked to have won FWA of the Day for ‘The Connected Restaurant’ with our creative collaborators UNIT9. The FWA’s been a regular in all our browser histories for nearly 20 years so it means a lot to join such illustrious company!
